cgcloud__Tour__c.name: cgcloud__Tour__c
cgcloud__Tour__c.description: Stores the details of the tour object.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date that a user referenced this record on.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date that a user viewed this record on.

cgcloud__Assignment_Confirmation__c.description: Specifies the tour assignment confirmation type for the user.

cgcloud__Cancel_Note__c.description: Note that can be specified if the tour is canceled.

cgcloud__Cancel_Reason__c.description: Indicates the reason that the tour was canceled for.

cgcloud__Cash_Check_In_Required__c.description: Defines whether the cash check-in at the end of each tour is mandatory.

cgcloud__Cash_Handling_Required__c.description: Specifies whether the driver can perform cash-related actions during the tour execution.

cgcloud__Completion_Release_Time__c.description: Stores the tour end release time.

cgcloud__Consider_Mileage__c.description: Specifies whether it's mandatory that the driver documents the odometer information when beginning and ending the tour.

cgcloud__Consider_Vehicle_Status__c.description: Specifies whether the driver must check and document the status or damages of the truck (and its trailers) at the beginning and the end of the tour.

cgcloud__Consider_Vehicle__c.description: Specifies whether the driver must check the license plate numbers of the truck and its trailers.

cgcloud__Default_Currency__c.description: Defines the default currency of the tour template.

cgcloud__Default_Driver__c.description: Reference to the default driver of the tour.

cgcloud__Default_Tour_Visit_Duration__c.description: The duration for creating tour-related visits based on the sequence. Itâ€™s measured in minutes.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Reference to the description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__End_Date_Time__c.description: First date and time of validity period of the tour.

cgcloud__End_Warehouse__c.description: Reference to the warehouse where the tour ended.

cgcloud__Express_Check_Out__c.description: Specifies whether the driver is allowed to use the express checkout type.

cgcloud__Has_End_Tour_Veh_Details_Rvw__c.description: Indicates whether the vehicle details are reviewed (true) or not (false) during the end tour activities.

cgcloud__Is_Odometer_Photo_Required__c.description: Specifies whether the user documents the odometer reading at the start and the end of the day with a picture.

cgcloud__Message__c.description: Message for the driver of the tour.

cgcloud__Multiple_Cash_Check_In_Allowed_.description: Defines whether multiple cash check-ins for one tour are allowed.

cgcloud__Odometer_End__c.description: Mileage of the truck after ending the tour.

cgcloud__Odometer_Start__c.description: Mileage of the truck before starting the tour.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org that the tour belongs to.

cgcloud__Show_Cash_Info__c.description: Show cash or expenses information in the tour summary report.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_End_Day_Geofencing.description: Specifies whether the validation of the user's GPS location against warehouse location is enabled at the end of the day.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_End_Day_GPS_Tracki.description: Specifies whether GPS tracking is allowed at the end of the day.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_End_Day_Time_Track.description: Specifies whether end-of-day time tracking is allowed.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_Seal_Scanning__c.description: Specifies whether the user validates a list of seals through scanning or manual entry. This field is applicable only when the Express Check-Out field is selected.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_Start_Day_Geofenci.description: Specifies whether the validation of the user's GPS location against warehouse location is enabled at the start of the day.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_Start_Day_GPS_Trac.description: Specifies whether GPS tracking is allowed at the start of the day.

cgcloud__Should_Allow_Start_Day_Time_Tra.description: Specifies whether the day and time tracking at the start of the day is allowed.

cgcloud__Start_Date_Time__c.description: Last date and time of validity period of the tour.

cgcloud__Trailer_1__c.description: Reference to the truck with trailer. Reference to the vehicle.

cgcloud__Trailer_2__c.description: Reference to the truck with second trailer. Reference to the vehicle.

cgcloud__Truck_Status_End__c.description: Specifies the type of damage observed after the tour finishes.

cgcloud__Truck_Status_Start__c.description: Specifies the type of damage observed before the tour starts.

cgcloud__Truck__c.description: Reference to the truck that carries out the tour. Reference to the vehicle.

cgcloud__Truck_ok_End__c.description: Specifies whether the truck (and its trailers) have had any damage after finishing the tour.

cgcloud__Truck_ok_Start__c.description: Specifies whether the truck (and its trailers) had any damage before starting the tour.
